fromDateTime.description: Earliest point in time (UTC or LocalTime), if null the update will not change this value.

toDateTime.description: Latest point in time (UTC or LocalTime), if null the update will not change this value.

fromDateTime.description: Earliest point in time (UTC or LocalTime), if null the update will not change this value.

toDateTime.description: Latest point in time (UTC or LocalTime), if null the update will not change this value.

deliveryLocationTimes.description: Time window update for a pickup or delivery location

quantity.description: Quantity to be multiplied by the unit price

fuelPercentage.description: Fuel surcharge percentage applied to the unit price

tollAndFerryCost.description: Total toll and ferry costs in NOK

totalLoadingTimeCost.description: Total loading time cost in NOK

totalUnloadingTimeCost.description: Total unloading time cost in NOK

includeInFuelExpense.description: Whether this expense should be included in the fuel surcharge calculation

items.description: An additional expense line item on a carrier price settlement

additionalExpenses.description: Additional expenses not covered by the standard settlement fields

final.description: If set to true the carrier settlement will be confirmed
